name: DeviantArt+ show Titles (Classic Site Only)
description: This theme has been merged into DeviantArt+ show Titles (Eclipse+Classic) which works on both the new and old version of the site and also includes has customization options. Restores titles to pictures in DeviantArt galleries and adds a border around all images, adds a red border around around NSFW images (like FA), and has nice hover effects. Looks best in my opinion with Nocturnal Theme Fork
additional_info:
version 1.something
- fixed red indicator to not look messed up before allowing yourself to see content
- fixed favorite star when logged in
